summary:
Hi! I'm Serban, an IT professional with a passion for code. I work full time as an SVP of Engineering at Trilogy, taught Software Design at TU-CN and founded a local tech start-up.

I lead an engineering organization of 30-40 people building full-stack products across diverse domains: Unity games, mobile apps, cloud platforms, and Salesforce extensions. I manage the complete engineering lifecycle—hiring (writing JDs, designing assessments, interviewing), architectural reviews and specifications, quarterly budget management ($6M/year), performance management, code reviews, and strategic planning with C-level executives on pricing, cost optimization, and portfolio evolution. I still write code regularly.

I have frequently switched between technologies, becoming proficient in TypeScript, Java, NodeJS, Spring, React, Unity and the SAP ecosystem. My current target area of expertise is around Amazon Web Services, AI/ML integration and cloud-native architectures.
